Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: ...:C_:pause:2:Why?...why am I not stronger? :C_:pause:2:Braver?...:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: They deserve better... Chase, Dorithy... you both deserve better.:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: I know what I must do...:C_:pause:1:C_:instaPrint:0:Wizard!:C_:pause:2:C_:changeBackground:DialogImages/HeroAndWizard.png

Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: Please make me braver! stronger!:C_:pause:6

Snippet.name: Wizard
Snippet.text: ...Ollie... :C_:pause:2:I already know you are brave.:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Wizard
Snippet.text: And by your journy's end you too will know.:C_:pause:10:C_:end:null

Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: ...:C_:pause:2: ¿Por qué?...¿por qué no estoy más fuerte? :C_:pause:2:¿valiente?...:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: Ellos merecen algo mejor ... Chase, Dorithy ...ustedes merecen algo mejor.:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: Sé lo que tengo que hacer ...:C_:pause:1:C_:instaPrint:0:Wizard!:C_:pause:2:C_:changeBackground:DialogImages/HeroAndWizard.png

Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: Por favor hazme más valiente! más fuerte!:C_:pause:6

Snippet.name: Mago
Snippet.text: ...Ollie... :C_:pause:2:Yo sé que tu eres valiente.:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Mago
Snippet.text: Y al final de tu aventura tu también lo sabrás.:C_:pause:10:C_:end:null

Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: ...:C_:pause:2: Tại sao?...tại sao tôi không thể mạnh hơn? :C_:pause:2:Can đảm hơn?...:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: họ đáng được tốt hơn…Chase, Dorithy…hai người đáng được tốt hơn:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: tôi đã biết tôi phải làm gì rồi...:C_:pause:1:C_:instaPrint:0:phù thủy!:C_:pause:2:C_:changeBackground:DialogImages/HeroAndWizard.png

Snippet.name: Ollie
Snippet.text: làm ơn hãy làm tôi chở nên can đảm hơn! mạnh hơn!:C_:pause:6

Snippet.name: phù thủy
Snippet.text: ...Ollie... :C_:pause:2:ta đã biết ngươi là một người can đảm:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: phù thủy
Snippet.text: và sau cuộc hành trình này ngươi sẽ biết:C_:pause:10:C_:end:null

Snippet.name: 奥利
Snippet.text: ...:C_:pause:2: 为什么？为什么我不能变得更强？ :C_:pause:2: 更勇敢？:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: 奥利
Snippet.text: 你们应该得到比这更好的生活...蔡斯，桃乐丝...你们都应该得到比这更好的生活。:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: 奥利
Snippet.text: 我知道我需要做什么... :C_:pause:1:C_:instaPrint:0:巫女！:C_:pause:2:C_:changeBackground:DialogImages/HeroAndWizard.png

Snippet.name: 奥利
Snippet.text: 请让我变得更加勇敢！强大吧！:C_:pause:6

Snippet.name: 巫师
Snippet.text: ...奥利... :C_:pause:2:我知道你已经非常勇敢了。:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: 巫师
Snippet.text: 当你结束这段旅程，你也会明白的。:C_:pause:10:C_:end:null

Snippet.name: オーリー
Snippet.text: ...:C_:pause:2: なぜ？...なぜ俺は強くないのか？ :C_:pause:2:もっと勇敢な？...:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: オーリー
Snippet.text: 彼らは、...チェイス、ドロシー... 彼らのベストを尽くした...:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: オーリー
Snippet.text: 俺は何をすべきかをわかってる... :C_:pause:1:C_:instaPrint:0:ウィザードよ！:C_:pause:2:C_:changeBackground:DialogImages/HeroAndWizard.png

Snippet.name: オーリー
Snippet.text: 俺に勇気を！力を！:C_:pause:6

Snippet.name: ウィザード
Snippet.text: ...オーリー... :C_:pause:2:私はすでにあなたが勇敢なのは分かっている。:C_:pause:4

Snippet.name: ウィザード
Snippet.text: 旅の終わりには君も分かるさ。:C_:pause:10:C_:end:null
